creditline: Gift of Mrs. Joseph B. Estabrook
markings:
[Minott] in oval on bottom
engraved: [Hubbard/I * R]
impressed on the bottom: [Made by Samuel Minott, Boston, 1732-1803]
text: While the elegant engraving on this tankard has not been identified, the object descended in the Hubbard and Estabrook families before being given to the Institute in 1957.
title: Tankard
